title: 神犬 杜威 呢一槍，令到尋晚12個美國政界大佬出聲支持香港

replies.msg:
GPhone fb



￼轉載自👉 https://t.me/demosisto_Int/184
【🇺🇸 政壇動向｜12美國政要譴責開槍鎮壓】

香港警察向抗爭者開真槍一事引起美國政壇極大回響，迄今至少12位跨黨派政要先後發聲，譴責政府及黑警的暴力鎮壓。

香港眾志 Demosistō駐美國東岸的羅冠聰 Nathan Law和Jeffrey Ngo會繼續努力，推動《香港人權民主法案》，亦促進華府及國會繼續支持香港人爭取民主自由的努力！

💪🏻拜登（Joe Biden）
前副總統、2020年民主黨總統參選人
“The brave people of Hong Kong deserve the full support of the United States as they demand the civil liberties and autonomy promised to them. Violent suppression is unacceptable. The world is watching.”
https://twitter.com/JoeBiden/status/1179142897184186370

💪🏻麥卡菲（Kevin McCarthy）
眾議院少數黨領袖
“As pro-democracy Hong Kongers demonstrate peacefully in the streets, Chinese police shot an 18-year-old protestor in the chest. This is what 70 years of Communist rule looks like in China — freedom is trampled and dissent is silenced. America still hears you, Hong Kong.”
https://twitter.com/GOPLeader/status/1179117686703439878

💪🏻德賓（Dick Durbin）
參議院少數黨黨鞭
“The latest developments in Hong Kong are extremely concerning. I’m glad the Senate Foreign Relations Committee was able to pass the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act last week for this exact purpose. We must support democracy and peace in Hong Kong.”
https://twitter.com/SenatorDurbin/status/1179093620059717637

💪🏻恩格爾（Eliot Engel）
眾議院外交事務委員會主席
“I am concerned by the use of live ammunition against Hong Kong protestors. The Hong Kong government, police have a duty to uphold the rule of law. Those responsible for human rights violations should be held accountable.”
https://twitter.com/HouseForeign/status/1179064878742544387

💪🏻曼南德茲（Bob Menendez）
參議院外交關係委員會資深議員
“As those fighting for their freedom of speech and freedom of assembly are met with live ammunition, the United States must not look the other way while the democratic aspirations of the people of Hong Kong are viciously trampled.”
https://twitter.com/SenatorMenendez/status/1179076722236502018

💪🏻魯比奧（Marco Rubio）
國會及行政當局中國委員會共同主席
“Hong Kong police’s excessive force against protesters leaves 51 people hospitalized and two in critical condition. Police shot one teenager with a live round. As Hong Kong continues to violate the basic rights of its citizens the U.S. and the world are watching.”
https://twitter.com/SenRubioPress/status/1179107248754298880

💪🏻布塔加智（Pete Buttigieg）
印第安納州南灣市長、2020年民主黨總統參選人
“Protesters in Hong Kong are risking their lives to defend democracy and demand freedom. Meanwhile, here at home, this president’s party is destroying the democratic norms that made America a beacon of freedom for the world.”
https://twitter.com/PeteButtigieg/status/1179052796156502018

💪🏻卡斯特羅（Julián Castro）
前房屋及都市發展部長、2020年民主黨總統參選人
“Today, the people of Hong Kong once again risked their lives to stand up for their freedom. I stand with them and am inspired by their example.”
https://twitter.com/JulianCastro/status/1179144959972298757

💪🏻約霍（Ted Yoho）
眾議院亞太小組委員會資深議員
“At an extremely turbulent time, we are witnessing democracy beginning to erode in Hong Kong, threats against the autonomous nation of Taiwan and the imprisonment of China’s own Uyghur population in Xinjiang.”
https://twitter.com/RepTedYoho/status/1179124684597682176

💪🏻克魯茲（Ted Cruz）
德州參議員
“Today’s shooting in Hong Kong marks an unacceptable escalation in the Chinese Communist Party’s assault on the people of Hong Kong and their peaceful protests against tyranny.”
https://twitter.com/SenTedCruz/status/1179117691921145856

💪🏻圖米（Pat Toomey）
賓州參議員
“It is important that the United States and free societies around the world support the people of Hong Kong, who are making an unprecedented stand against Xi’s repressive tactics.”
https://twitter.com/SenToomey/status/1179070993907748864

💪🏻史葛（Rick Scott）
佛羅里達州參議員
“Pro-Beijing forces have continued to escalate the situation. Pro-democracy protesters are fighting for their right to self determination and human dignity. China can end this chaos at any point but instead they’re cracking down.”
https://twitter.com/SenRickScott/status/1179109550101803011

「反極權運動」守護香港，深層改革

抗爭轉型及進化建議：
重要目標：11月24號區議會選舉
和平勇武後勤文宣議員：各司其職
強調：愛港市民、美國制裁、親北京賣港賊、暴政殘害人民、公平公正選舉
防範：掌心雷、利誘淺黃淺藍市民、抹黑
流水式示威：警察舉旗咪去另一個地方示威，香港咁多地方可以去，佢想捉你，你咪話走緊囉，太多人行得慢好正常，合情合理合法！
適當武力/自衛反擊：合情又合理！
游擊戰？：對抗黑社會/恐怖分子
創意活動：唱歌比賽？跑步大叫？商場罷買

公平、自由、民主、公義、人權得來不易
漫長的道路上需要你支持我，我扶持你
有時惘然若失，但我們也要自信往前邁步
有咩嘢唔想失去，就努力捍衛同守護
現在就用自己雙手實踐夢想，迎接未來

短期目標：改善抗爭能力，提升身份認同
建議：各有各做，best effort
中期目標：區議會(94%民主產生)
建議：關注身邊人，團結一致，各有各做
長期目標：強化民主陣營勢力
建議：抗爭生活化，減少比錢極權陣營
終極目標：民選議會、民選政府
建議：國際戰線、傳播思想、滲透內部

公務員：小隱於野，中隱於市，大隱於朝
和勇合一：1.合法之下，最大勇武
2. 做任何事，永不被捕

@謠言係疫症•不傳播•去求診•澄清藥
@FakeNews係Cancer•不擴散•求事實•割

升級技能/能力值/level：1. 讀書、識法律2.運動、鬥長命3.和勇合一精神4.批判性思考5.精通專業技能6.低消費、高儲蓄
每日任務：1.幫襯良心商店、抵制送中商戶2.開AC玩國際戰線 (Twitter, IG, Facebook, Reddit)3.多發佈正面資訊、冷處理負面POST4.十點咆哮發泄5.思考完就take action
每星期任務：1. 罷買日2. 教育家中兩老3. 去連儂牆幫手4.參加一樣民主活動5. 諗下點樣爭取民主
每月任務：1. 換美金，走資2. 陪審員/派傳單/放映會/各有各做
或者做唔足，但我會堅持；Best effort，你呢？民主尚未成功，同志仍需努力

要記住極權如何打壓香港示威：
1.抹黑：利用少部分的暴力衝突而將全部示威者形容為「邪惡」、示威=港獨、新華社、環球時報、人民日報
2.誤導：送中條例、說謊、黃色object等等
3.滲透：5毛、陳雲、黃x民、譚香文
4.假民意/曲解民意：主流民意是......
5.5毛輿論-分化、負面、fake news、煽動手足做負效益/低效益工作
6.強迫企業自我審查
7.出動黑社會、愛國暴徒
8.扮示威者：(負面的)破壞eg.遊行
9.嫁禍示威者：打議員打記者打女仔
10.扮好人/扮對話：「江山易改本性難移」
11.警察濫權、濫捕、暴力執法、恐嚇
12.利用親中人士發表「假」權威言論
